name: announceit
description: AnnounceIT is a solution for broadcasting agencies which allows them to be able to receive and manage announcements.

scripts.purge: npm run drop-tables && npm run create-tables
scripts.test-db: sudo -u postgres psql -tc 'SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname='announceit_test'' | grep -q 1 || sudo -u postgres psql -c 'CREATE DATABASE announceit_test;'
scripts.test-db-live: psql -u postgres -tc 'SELECT 1 FROM pg_database WHERE datname='announceit_test'' | grep -q 1 || psql -u postgres -c 'CREATE DATABASE announceit_test;'
scripts.purge-test: NODE_ENV=test npm run test-db && npm run drop-test-tables && npm run create-test-tables
scripts.purge-test-live: NODE_ENV=test npm run test-db-live && npm run drop-test-tables && npm run create-test-tables
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npm run purge-test && NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register server/tests/*.js --exit
scripts.test-live: NODE_ENV=test npm run purge-test-live && nyc --reporter=html --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register server/tests/*.js --exit
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build-babel

author: Bertrand B Masabo
